column4: hello, playing video increases my processor activity until almos 100% in fullscreen mode, is it normal? I have already installed de nvidia driver
do you mean to paste the output of glxinfo here?
when i put my output on http://pastebin.com i got a query failure, i this way what you meant before?
ochosi So use a different pastebin, there are several thousand to choose from
What are you using to play it with?
just totem, playing the sample video "experiencing ubuntu.ogg" that comes with ubuntu
did you get any idea about my issue?
I asked what you're using to try and play the files...
just totem, playing the sample video "experiencing ubuntu.ogg" that comes with ubuntu
No idea then, that's a bit odd with the video drivers installed :/
so...it is a problem of the nvidia drivers, or it's a problem of codecs?
You could try updating to the 100.xx.xx nVidia drivers and see if that helps
